column5: Bay front cottage with private pier with a boat dock so bring your boat kayak or paddle boards. This area has great fishing. Sleeps up to 12. Relax in the screen in porch or have dinner in the sunroom while watching the water. 3 queen size beds, a twin/twin trundle, and two couches with pool outs.
column8: "Playing Hooky" Copano Bay front, lighted pier.
